name: JAN KALYAN SHIKSHAN PRASAR SAMITI

address: In front of Ramayan Mela Parisar, Chitrakoot Dham

briefDescription: The organisation operates Chitrakoot district in Uttar Pradesh.Jan Kalyan Shikshan Prasar Samiti (JKSPS)  started to work with mandated of participative development and creation of employment through farming and non-farming activities for sustainable livelihood options support and assistance towards land reclamation enabled the people to earn supplementary income for their livelihood.
